channel.title: Need Some Help Deciding On A Server/Client
channel.description:
Okay, Thanks to the help from alot of you I FINALLY got the port forward and I can host servers 24/7/365 and welcome other people to come play on them. Thanks everyone I really appreciate it. There IS one last thing though, HaHa, there always is ;) Okay I need your help deciding on a server to host keep in mind I am a total newbie. When I think about it, I want it to be realistic like RuneScape, Kinda Simple For A Newbie, I have a buddy who's a coder so a little challenge won't hurt. Basically, I wanna be able to give mod, admin, and owner/co-owner rights to people, but I don't want everyone in the game to be using Item ID's to rezz things for themselves, Nuh-Uh, just the administration and staff. So, I need a Server/Client if you guys have any recommendations or "any for-sure" choices throw them down at the bottom, appreciate all the help!
Thanks, :cool: Captain :cool:

item.title: Need Some Help Deciding On A Server/Client
item.dc:creator: @CaptainNegatory CaptainNegatory
item.description:
@CaptainNegatory wrote:

Okay,
Thanks to the help from alot of you I FINALLY got the port forward and I can host servers 24/7/365 and welcome other people to come play on them. Thanks everyone I really appreciate it.
